Items.Title: Application No. N 160164 ZRM submitted by Acadia Sherman Avenue LLC pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, to establish a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area on property located on the corner of Broadway and Sherman Avenue, Borough of Manhattan, Community Board 12, Council District 10.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application No. C 150438 ZMM submitted by Acadia Sherman Avenue LLC, pursuant to Section 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for the amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 3a, establishing an R8X and R9A district, and establishing a C2-4 district within the proposed R8X/R9A district, on property located on the corner of Broadway and Sherman Avenue, Borough of Manhattan, Community Board 12, Council District 10.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application No. C 150438 ZMM submitted by Acadia Sherman Avenue LLC, pursuant to Section 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for the amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 3a, establishing an R8X and R9A district, and establishing a C2-4 district within the proposed R8X/R9A district, on property located on the corner of Broadway and Sherman Avenue, Borough of Manhattan, Community Board 12, Council District 10.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Disapproved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
